title: Gêmeas Trans: Uma Nova Vida
overview: Mayla and Sofia meet again to enjoy vacations, meet old friends again and face new challenges. In 2021, at the age of 19, the sisters underwent sexual reassignment surgery together, in a clinic in the city of Blumenau, in the Brazilian state of Santa Catarina, and now they face the challenges of their new life. Mayla lives in Buenos Aires, where she is studying medicine, and Sofia lives in Franca, in the interior of the state of São Paulo, where she is studying engineering.
